title: Is there any technology changing batteries on smartphones and laptops? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes lithium batteries continually getting better for smartphones and laptops. The chemistry of the batteries with recent NMC is very good. The anodes and cathods are also getting better. There are new solid state batteries already being tested that will be in phones next year. They charge faster and have 2 to 3x the capacity of todays batteries. They will also last longer.

The short answer is yes, there’s stuff in the works to replace the ubiquitous lithium ion batteries… but don’t hold your breath. So far, all promising alternatives are either too dangerous, too expensive (either to produce or use), or both.
